title: Portfolio Analysis
description: Access blockchain wallet data and analytics through Moralis APIs for portfolio tracking, token balances, and investment performance

wallet_history.title: Wallet Transaction History
wallet_history.description: Retrieve the full transaction history of a specified wallet address

token_balances.title: Token Balances
token_balances.description: Get token balances for a specific wallet address and their token prices in USD

wallet_approvals.title: Wallet Approvals
wallet_approvals.description: Retrieve active ERC20 token approvals for a specified wallet address

wallet_swaps.title: Wallet Swaps
wallet_swaps.description: Get all swap-related transactions (buy, sell) for a wallet address

wallet_net_worth.title: Wallet Net Worth
wallet_net_worth.description: Get the net worth of a wallet in USD across multiple chains

wallet_profitability_summary.title: Wallet Profitability Summary
wallet_profitability_summary.description: Retrieve a summary of wallet profitability

wallet_profitability.title: Wallet Profitability Breakdown
wallet_profitability.description: Retrieve detailed profitability breakdown for a wallet

wallet_stats.title: Wallet Stats
wallet_stats.description: Get statistical information about a wallet

states.description: States for each portfolio blockchain analysis skill (disabled, public, or private)

wallet_defi_positions.title: Wallet DeFi Positions
wallet_defi_positions.description: Get the positions summary of a wallet address

address.description: The wallet address to get DeFi positions for

wallet_nfts.title: Wallet NFTs
wallet_nfts.description: Get NFTs owned by a given wallet address

address.description: The address of the wallet to get NFTs for

format.description: The format of the token ID ('decimal' or 'hex')

limit.description: The desired page size of the result

exclude_spam.description: Should spam NFTs be excluded from the result?

token_addresses.description: The non-fungible token (NFT) addresses to get balances for

cursor.description: The cursor returned in the previous response (for pagination)

normalize_metadata.description: The option to enable metadata normalization

media_items.description: Should preview media data be returned?

include_prices.description: Should NFT last sale prices be included in the result?

api_key.title: Moralis API Key
api_key.description: API key for Moralis API service
